description: Dave Rubin of “The Rubin Report” has been off-grid with no access to news, social media, or his phone since July 31. Watch live as guest-host Sage Steele tells him everything he missed thus far in August. Watch Dave’s live reactions to finding out about Kamala Harris’ disastrous first interview as a presidential candidate with CNN’s Dana Bash; Harris picking Tim Walz to be her vice president; Walz’s stolen valor scandal; Nancy Pelosi finally admitting the truth about the coup against Joe Biden to the New Yorker’s David Remnick; Elon Musk’s abrupt ending of Twitter in Brazil; Robert F. Kennedy Jr. suspending his campaign and his surprise endorsement of Donald Trump; Joe Rogan telling Andrew Huberman how MSNBC deceptively edited a clip of him to make it look like he was praising Kamala Harris instead of Tulsi Gabbard; “Real Time with Bill Maher’s” Bill Maher having a tense moment with Nancy Pelosi when he realizes how crazy Democrats have gotten; the University of Missouri, Harley-David
title: Dave Rubin Returns to the Grid After 31 Days! Sage Steele Guest-Hosts
